quote: AWOKEN returns to the human element to unconscious bias training.
author: Tyler Huyser, Founder of AWOKEN

quote: It's one thing to hear a story. It's another to be completely immersed in it.
author: Amir Diwane, Human Resources at Publicis Health

quote: AWOKEN is a great we to experience another point of view without having that fear of 'the other'.
author: Participant

quote: With something like this, it forces you to tackle difficult issues head on.
author: Participant
